name: one
definition: The default numeral for one (1). // It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: two
definition: The natural number two (2). // It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: three
definition: The natural number three (3). // It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: four
definition: The default numeral for four (4). It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: five
definition: The default numeral for five (5). It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: six
definition: The natural number six (6). // It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.
burmese: ခြောက်ခဲ့သည်

name: seven
definition: The natural number seven (7). // It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: eight
definition: The natural number eight (8). // It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: nine
definition: The default numeral for nine (9). It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: ten
definition: The default numeral for ten (10). It should not include a numeral classifier, but instead be only the bare numeral.

name: twenty
definition: The natural number twenty (20).

name: hundred
definition: The natural number one hundred (100).

name: 1 du
definition: The speaker and exactly one other person. // The first person dual pronominal stem. In varieties which have this stem, it is typically derived from a proposed etymon #tsi. Varieties which lack stem suppletion for dual pronominal forms should have their compounds recorded as such.

name: 1 n sg excl
definition: Exclusive form of the non-singular and non-dual pronominal stem. This should only be filled out for languages which have a suppletive clusivity distinction.
burmese: ကျွန်တစ်ဦးတည်းနှင့်တကွ

name: 1 n sg incl
definition: Inclusive form of the non-singular and non-dual pronominal stem. This should only be filled out for languages which have a suppletive clusivity distinction.

name: 1 sg
definition: The first-person singular pronominal stem, typically a reflex of PTB *ŋa or *ka.

name: thousand
definition: The natural number one thousand (1000).

name: 2 n sg
definition: Second person non-singular pronominal stem. This will not likely have a suppletive dual counterpart.

name: 2 sg
definition: The second-person singular pronominal stem, typically but not always a reflex of *naŋ.

name: 3 n sg
definition: Third person non-singular pronominal stem, unmarked for gender. If gendered forms are attested they should be added under separate concepts.

name: 3 sg
definition: Third person singular pronominal stem. This may in some cases also be one of the demonstrative stems, as is the case in much of Bodo-Garo.

name: to be above
definition: Situated in a higher place than something else.

name: Accipitridae (raptor)
definition: A bird of prey with broad wings and a hooked bill. Kites are the most common which occur in the area. This should be the most general term for this class of birds, and not a compound term for a specific species. Any specific genera/species names should be noted separately.
burmese: သိမ်းငှက်၊ လင်းယုန် သို့မဟုတ် စွန်ရဲ

name: afternoon
definition: The part of the day which follows noon, between noon and evening.

name: brewed alcohol
definition: A fermented drink is a beverage containing alcohol because of a metabolic process that converts sugar to acids, gases and/or alcohol (e.g. beer or wine).

name: distilled alcohol
definition: Alcoholic beverages made through distillation, such as whiskey or vodka. This will often be a borrowing, either from Tai or IA, though some varieties will retain a native form.
burmese: ပေါင်းခံအရက်

name: to be alive
definition: To have life and be living, not dead.
burmese: အသက်ရှင်ဖို့

name: amber
definition: A hard, translucent fossilized resin, typically yellowish-brown in color. Used in some communities for ornaments such as earrings.

name: to be angry
definition: Feeling or showing strong annoyance, displeasure, or hostility, usually toward someone or some thing.

name: animal (general)
definition: Any living organism characterized by voluntary movement, the possession of cells with noncellulose cell walls and specialized sense organs enabling rapid response to stimuli, and the ingestion of complex organic substances such as plants and other animals.

name: termite
definition: A soft-bodied insect of the order Isoptera; individuals feed on cellulose and live in colonies with a caste system comprising three types of functional individuals: sterile workers and soldiers, and the reproductives.

name: ant (general)
definition: Any of the black, red, brown, or yellow insects of the family Formicidae characterized by a large head and by living in organized colonies.
burmese: ပုရွက်ဆိတ်

name: armpit
definition: The hollow beneath the junction of the arm and shoulder.

name: elbow
definition: The joint between the forearm and the upper arm.
burmese: တံတောင်ဆစ်

name: shoulder
definition: The joint connecting the upper arm and the torso, especially the top or outermost part.

name: wrist
definition: The joint connecting the hand and the forearm. This will typically be a compund involving the general hand/arm stem, and is likely to be entirely distinct from the term for elbow.
burmese: လက်ကောက်ဝတ်

name: arm (general)
definition: One of the two upper extremeties of the human body, extending from the shoulder to the wrist. This should be the most general term, and will often include the hand as well. A term for arm which does not include the hand is not expected.

name: arrow
definition: Pointed projectile that is shot with a bow.

name: to ascend (move up)
definition: To move from a lower to a higher position by climbing. This should be distinct from the general go verbs which exist as part of systems of topographical deixis.
burmese: တက်ရန် သို့မဟုတ် တက်ရန်

name: ash
definition: The powdery incombustible residue left after the burning of a substance. Additional terms for different types of ash may be present, such as the stringy ash left over from burning dry bamboo. This concept is only for the most basic powdery type, but other forms should be documented as such.

name: to be ashamed
definition: Feeling shame or guilt. This is distinct from being shy.

name: to awaken
definition: To stop sleeping and become conscious, to stir or come into awareness.

name: axe (general)
definition: A tool for felling trees or chopping wood consisting of a heavy metallic or stone head flattened to a blade on one side, and which is attached to a usually wooden handle.

name: back (of body)
definition: The rear surface of the human body from the shoulders to the hips.

name: to be bad
definition: Not good; unfavorable; negative.

name: bag
definition: A container made of flexible material with an opening at the top, used for carrying or storing items.

name: bamboo
definition: A group of woody perennial evergreen plants in the true grass family Poaceae, subfamily Bambusoideae, tribe Bambuseae.

name: bamboo shoot
definition: The edible shoots (new bamboo culms that come out of the ground) of many bamboo species // Often harvested as part of local cuisine, either used fresh, dried or fermented.

name: banana (fruit)
definition: The fruit of the banana tree.

name: banana tree
definition: The tropical treelike plant which bears clusters of bananas. The plant, of the genus Musa, has large, elongated leaves.

name: banyan (tree)
definition: A large, tropical tree belonging to the genus Ficus, typically Ficus benghalensis, with aerial roots that grow into new trunks, often used for shade or as a spiritual symbol in many cultures.

name: basket (general)
definition: The general term for any kind of basket, a container woven typically from cane or bamboo used to store or carry many different kinds of items or materials.

name: bat (animal)
definition: A small, flying mammal in the order Chiroptera with wings consisting of skin stretched over a framework of bones, typically active at night.

name: bean (general)
definition: Any of various leguminous plants grown for their edible seeds and pods.

name: bear (animal)
definition: A large beast of prey of the family Ursidae, related to the dog and raccoon, having shaggy hair, a very small tail, and flat feet.

name: bed
definition: A piece of furniture used for sleeping or resting, typically consisting of a mattress and a frame.

name: beehive
definition: A structure that provides a natural habitation for bees; as in a hollow tree.

name: bee (general)
definition: Any pollenating flying insect belonging to the Anthophila clade within the order Hymenoptera. Typically having yellow and black colouring with a striped pattern on the abdoment.

name: to beg
definition: To ask for something, typically money or food, as charity or as a favor. This may be either due to need through poverty, or as an act of religious devotion such as among Buddhist monks.
burmese: တောင်းရမ်းရန်

name: belly (exterior)
definition: The lower part of the front of the torso (or a comparable part of an animal), confined by the upper side by the midriff and the lowerside by the pelvis. Contains the intestines.
burmese: ဗိုက်၊အပြင်

name: to be below (under)
definition: Situated in a lower place than something else.

name: to be big
definition: Of great size or extent relative to some other thing.

name: bird (general term)
definition: Any of the bipedal, warm-blooded vertebrates that lay eggs having wings which, for most species, enables them to fly.
burmese: ငှက်၊ ယေဘူယျ

name: to bite
definition: Clamping the teeth hard on something.

name: to be bitter
definition: Having an acrid taste, typical of citrus peel or bitter gourd Momordica charantia.

name: blood
definition: A fluid connective tissue consisting of the plasma and cells that circulate in the blood vessels.

name: to bloom
definition: To bear flowers or to start bearing flowers; to blossom.
burmese: ပန်းတစ်ပွင့်၊

name: to blow (wind)
definition: (Of the wind or a current of air) To move.

name: to blow (with mouth)
definition: To expel air through persed lips.

name: body
definition: The physical structure of a human or animal, including the bones, flesh, and organs.
burmese: ခန္ဓာကိုယ်

name: to boil (liquid)
definition: To reach or cause to reach the temperature at which a liquid bubbles and turns to vapor by adding heat.

name: bone
definition: Any of the components of an endoskeleton, consisting mainly of calcium phosphate, collagen and cells.

name: bone marrow
definition: The spongy tissue in the hollow parts of bones.
burmese: ရိုးတွင်းခြင်ဆီ

name: to be born
definition: To come into existence, typically through childbirth.

name: Bos frontalis (mithun)
definition: A member of the Bos genus having a large size and posessing characteristic horns with a wide base. Important draught animal for local agriculture.

name: bow
definition: A weapon made of a curved piece of wood or other flexible material whose ends are connected by a string, used for shooting arrows, or a weapon based on it, consisting of a bow mounted on a stock.
comment: this should be split between bow and crossbow probably.

name: crossbow
definition: A weapon based on the bow, consisting of a bow mounted on a stock.

name: brain
definition: The organ of the central nervous system of an animal or human located in the skull that controls the actions and thoughts of the animal or human.

name: to break (something)
definition: To come apart or split into pieces (intransitive).

name: breast
definition: The fleshy organ on the chest of a sexually mature human female containing mammary glands.

name: bridge
definition: A structure that spans and provides a passage over a road, railway, river, or some other obstacle.

name: to bring
definition: To transport toward somewhere; to take something or somebody with oneself somewhere.

name: elder brother
definition: A male with more years of age than one or more of his siblings.
burmese: အစ်ကိုအကြီး

name: Bubalus bubalis (water buffalo)
definition: A large bovid originating in South Asia, Southeast Asia, and China.

name: to burn (intransitive)
definition: To put fire on something or to be on fire.

name: to bury (object)
definition: To put in the ground and cover with earth.
burmese: သင်္ဂြိုဟ်ရန်

name: to buy
definition: To obtain in exchange for money or goods.

name: cane (rattan)
definition: Material from rattan palms which is used to create furniture.

name: cattle (domestic)
definition: Domesticated bovine animals, including cows, steers and bulls, raised and bred on a ranch or farm.

name: cave
definition: A large underground chamber or network of chambers.

name: cheek
definition: The soft skin on each side of the face, between the eyes and the chin; the outer surface of the sides of the oral cavity.

name: chest
definition: The portion of the body from the base of the neck to the top of the abdomen; the thorax.

name: to chew
definition: To crush with the teeth by repeated closing and opening of the jaws; done to food to soften it and break it down by the action of saliva before it is swallowed.

name: child
definition: A young human being below the age of puberty or below the legal age of majority.
burmese: ကလေး၊ မွေးကင်းစ

name: chili pepper
definition: Any fruit of a plant of the botanical genus Capsicum, noted for their spicy and burning flavour due to presence of capsaicin.
burmese: ငရုတ်သီးမှုန့်

name: chin
definition: The bottom of the face, below the mouth.

name: claw (animal)
definition: The hard, keratin part growing at the feet of animals.

name: to close (tr)
definition: To shut or cover the entrance or opening of something, preventing access or exit.

name: cloth
definition: A woven fabric such as used in dressing, decorating, cleaning or other practical use.

name: cloud (rain)
definition: A visible mass of condensed water vapor floating in the atmosphere, typically high above the ground.

name: to be cold (of items)
definition: Having a low temperature.

name: to be cold (of weather)
definition: Having a low temperature (of the weather).
burmese: ရာသီဥတုအေး

name: to be black
definition: Of the very darkest color owing to the absence of or complete absorption of light, the opposite of white.

name: to be green
definition: Having green as its colour; having the hue of that portion of the visible spectrum lying between yellow and blue, evoked in the human observer by radiant energy with wavelengths of approximately 490 to 570 nanometers.
burmese: အစိမ်းရောင်

name: to be red
definition: A color resembling the hue of blood, fire, or a ripe tomato.

name: to be white
definition: A color characterized by the presence of all wavelengths of visible light, often associated with purity or innocence.

name: to be yellow
definition: Having the colour of a yolk, a lemon or gold.

name: to come back (return)
definition: To go there where one was before.
burmese: ပြန်လာရန် သို့မဟုတ် ပြန်လာရန်

name: to cook (general)
definition: To prepare food by heating it.
burmese: ချက်ပြုတ်ရန်

name: corpse
definition: A dead body.

name: cotton
definition: Fiber obtained from plants of the genus Gossypium, used in making fabrics, cordage, and padding and for producing artificial fibers and cellulose.

name: to count
definition: To determine the amount of something or to enumerate the digits of one's numeral system.

name: to cover
definition: To place something over or upon to conceal or protect.
burmese: ဖုံးအုပ်ရန်

name: crab
definition: Decapod crustaceans of the infraorder Brachyura, which typically have a very short projecting tail (abdomen) (Greek: βραχύς / brachys = short, οὐρά / οura = tail), usually entirely hidden under the thorax.

name: cricket
definition: An insect related to grasshoppers but smaller in size and known for its distinctive chirping sound.

name: cup (traditional)
definition: A concave vessel for holding liquid, generally adorned with either a handle or a stem.

name: to dance
definition: To move with rhythmic steps or movements, especially in time to music.

name: dawn (before sunrise)
definition: A period of time at the beginning of the day shortly before sunrise during which the light gradually becomes stronger.

name: daytime
definition: The period between sunrise and sunset where one enjoys daylight.

name: deer (general)
definition: The common name for 41 species of even-toed ungulates that compose the family Cervidae in the order Artiodactyla; males have antlers.

name: to descend (move down)
definition: To move downward or to a lower place. Distinct from moving downriver, descent is opposite to the concept of climbing.

name: descendants
definition: One who is the progeny of someone at any distance of time.

name: to desire (want)
definition: To want to do something, to wish for something to happen, or to have affection for someone.
burmese: ဆန္ဒရှိရန်

name: dew
definition: Atmospheric moisture that condenses after a warm day and appears during the night on cool surfaces as small drops.

name: to die
definition: To cease to live.

name: to dig
definition: To move earth, rocks, etc. out of the way, usually to create a hole.

name: to be dirty
definition: Covered with or containing unpleasant substances such as dirt or grime.
burmese: ညစ်ပတ်တယ်။

name: dog
definition: A domesticated carnivorous mammal, Canis familiaris, with a pointed snout, a long tail, and a coat of fur, often kept as a pet or trained for hunting or guarding.

name: doorway
definition: An opening, or passage in a fence or wall; the entrance through which you enter or leave a room or building.
burmese: တံခါးပေါက်

name: dove
definition: One of several birds of the family Columbidae.

name: to dream
definition: To experience a series of images, thoughts, and sensations during sleep, often accompanied by emotions and creating a sense of reality.
burmese: အိပ်မက်မက်ဖို့

name: to drink
definition: To consume a liquid through the mouth.

name: drum
definition: A percussion instrument consisting of at least one membrane that is stretched over a shell and struck directly with the player's hands or with a drumstick.

name: to be drunk
definition: Being in a temporary state in which one's physical and mental faculties are impaired due to excessive consumption of alcohol.
burmese: မူးသည်၊ မူးသည်။

name: to be dry
definition: To be lacking any discernable moisture.

name: duck
definition: An aquatic bird of the family Anatidae, having a flat bill and webbed feet.

name: dusk (just after sunset)
definition: The darkest stage of twilight in the evening.
burmese: နေဝင်ရီတရော

name: dust
definition: Tiny particles of earth or other matter that settle on surfaces or are stirred up by movement.
burmese: ဖုန်မှုန့်

name: ear
definition: The organ of hearing, consisting of the pinna, auditory canal, eardrum, malleus, incus, stapes and cochlea.

name: earth (area or plot)
definition: The soft and loose material forming a great part of the Earth surface.

name: east
definition: One of the four principal compass points, specifically 90°, conventionally directed to the right on maps. The direction of the rising sun.

name: to be easy
definition: Requiring little skill or effort; posing no difficulty.
burmese: လွယ်ကူစေရန်

name: to eat
definition: To take food into the body through the mouth and swallow it. As applies to hard foods such as curries.

name: to eat
definition: To take food into the body through the mouth and swallow it. As applies to rice and soft foots.

name: egg (general)
definition: The oval reproductive body laid by female birds, containing the embryo and nutrients for its growth.

name: elephant
definition: A mammal of the order Proboscidea, having a trunk, and two large ivory tusks jutting from the upper jaw. Elephants are the largest land animals now existing.

name: embers
definition: A small, glowing piece of coal or wood, as in a dying fire.

name: to embrace (hug)
definition: To hold someone tightly in one's arms as a sign of affection or support.

name: to emerge
definition: To come out from a hidden or enclosed place.
burmese: ပေါ်ထွက်လာရန်

name: to be empty
definition: To have nothing inside or to not be occupied by anyone or anything.

name: to enter
definition: To come or go into a place, such as a building or room.

name: ereyesterday
definition: The day before yesterday.

name: evening
definition: That part of the day in which daylight decreases and the night falls.

name: to extinguish (fire)
definition: To make something stop burning.
burmese: ငြိမ်းအေးရန်

name: eye
definition: The organ that is sensitive to light, which it converts to electrical signals passed to the brain, by which means animals and humans see.

name: eyebrow
definition: The hair that grows over the bone ridge above the eye socket.

name: eyelid
definition: Either of two movable folds of skin that cover and uncover the eye, protecting it from injury, dust, and light.

name: face
definition: The front part of the head, featuring the eyes, nose, and mouth and the surrounding area.

name: faeces (excrement)
definition: Substance that human and animal bodies release from time to time as a little pile of waste remaining from digestion, after it has been collected in the colon.

name: to fall (of objects)
definition: To descend in free fall due to the effect of gravity.

name: family (household)
definition: A group comprising parents, offsprings and others closely related or associated with them.

name: to be far
definition: Having a large intervening distance with regard to something.

name: to be fast
definition: Occurring or happening within a short time.
burmese: မြန်တယ်၊ မြန်တယ်။

name: to be fat
definition: Carrying a larger-than-normal amount of fat or weight.

name: fat (substance)
definition: Oily substance as part of animal flesh.

name: father
definition: A male parent.

name: to fear
definition: To be scared of; to have an uncontrollable emotion of anxiety about something that causes a scared reaction or frightening impression.

name: feather
definition: A branching, hair-like structure that grows on the skin of birds and protects them against coldness and water and allows their wings to create lift.

name: fence
definition: A barrier, railing, or other upright structure, typically of wood or wire, enclosing an area of land to mark a boundary, control access, or prevent escape.

name: festival
definition: A day or period of celebration, typically for religious, cultural, or historical reasons.

name: to be few (in number)
definition: A small number of, not many.
burmese: အနည်းငယ်ဖြစ်ရန်

name: jhum field
definition: A type of slash-and-burn agriculture used in various parts of the world, in which the land is cleared of vegetation and burned to provide fertilizer.
burmese: ခုတ်ထစ်ခြင်းနှင့် မီးရှို့ခြင်းအကွက်

name: paddy field
definition: A flooded field in which rice is grown.

name: finger
definition: One of the long extremities of the hand that is used for gripping objects.

name: fingernail
definition: The hard, flat, translucent covering near the tip of a human finger, useful for scratching and fine manipulation.

name: thumb
definition: The shortest and thickest of the fingers that can be placed against the others in order to create a firm grip.

name: fire
definition: The state of combustion in which inflammable material burns, producing heat, flames and often smoke.

name: fireplace (hearth)
definition: The floor of a fireplace, usually made of brick or stone.

name: firewood
definition: Wood intended to be burned.

name: firefly
definition: A nocturnal, bioluminescent beetle of the family Lampyridae.

name: fish
definition: A cold-blooded vertebrate animal that lives in water that moves with the help of fins and breathes using gills (Pisces).

name: to be flat
definition: Having an surface, without hills or bumps. Distinct from level. This concept may refer to any object and may be at any angle. It is distinct from level.

name: flea
definition: Any of the wingless insects composing the order Siphonaptera; most are ectoparasites of mammals and birds. (Source: MGH)

name: to flee (run away)
definition: Leaving a dangerous or unpleasant situation.

name: to flood
definition: A large amount of water covering an area that is usually dry, due to high amounts of rain or snow runoff.

name: to flow (of water)
definition: To move as a fluid from one position to another (e.g. of water or of people).
burmese: စီးဆင်းရန်၊ ရေ

name: flower
definition: The reproductive structure of angiosperm plants, consisting of stamens and carpels surrounded by petals and sepals all borne on the receptacle.

name: to fly
definition: To move autonomously through the air, without any part of the object or object's enclosure touching anything attached to the ground.
burmese: ပျံသန်းရန်

name: fog (mist)
definition: Water droplets or, rarely, ice crystals suspended in the air in sufficient concentration to reduce visibility appreciably.

name: to fold
definition: To bend a thin material (such as paper) over so that it comes in contact with itself.
burmese: ခေါက်ရန်၊ အထည်

name: forest
definition: A vegetation community dominated by trees and other woody shrubs, growing close enough together that the tree tops touch or overlap, creating various degrees of shade on the forest floor.

name: to forget
definition: To lose memory of something.

name: fowl
definition: A bird that is kept for its meat and eggs.

name: fox
definition: A carnivorous relatively small canine of the species Vulpes Vulpes.

name: freckle
definition: A small brownish or reddish pigmentation spot on the surface of the skin.

name: frog
definition: Any insectivorous anuran amphibian of the family Ranidae, such as Rana temporaria of Europe, having a short squat tailless body with a moist smooth skin and very long hind legs specialized for hopping.

name: fruit
definition: The sweet and fleshy product of a tree or other plant that contains seed and can be eaten as food.

name: to be satiated
definition: Having eaten or drunk enough.

name: to be full (container)
definition: Containing the most or maximum amount possible in the given available space.
burmese: ကွန်တိန်နာတစ်ခု၏အပြည့်

name: ginger
definition: A herbaceous perennial which grows annual stems about a meter tall bearing narrow green leaves and yellow flowers.

name: to give
definition: To transfer the possession or holding (of an object) to another person.

name: to go (general)
definition: To get from one place to another by any means.

name: to go downriver
definition: To move in an upstream direction, such as along a river. Moving against the direction that water would flow. This is a part of topographical deixis common to the region.

name: to go upriver
definition: To move in an downstream direction, such as along a river. Moving with the direction that water would flow. This is a part of topographical deixis common to the region.
burmese: မြစ်ထဲဆင်းဖို့

name: gold (metal)
definition: A heavy yellow elemental metal of great value, with atomic number 79 and symbol Au.

name: gong
definition: An African, East and South East Asian musical percussion instrument that takes the form of a flat, circular metal disc which is hit with a mallet.

name: to be good
definition: To be morally right or virtuous.

name: granary
definition: A building for storing threshed grain.

name: grandfather
definition: The father of one of someone's parents.

name: grandmother
definition: The mother of one of someone's parents.

name: grass
definition: A very large and widespread family of Monocotyledoneae, with more than 10.000 species, most of which are herbaceous, but a few are woody. The stems are jointed, the long, narrow leaves originating at the nodes. The flowers are inconspicuous, with a much reduced perianth, and are wind-pollinated or cleistogamous.

name: grave, tomb
definition: A place (commonly marked with a headstone) where one or more people are buried (usually in a coffin underneath the ground).

name: to grind
definition: To break something into small pieces by pressing it flat, or grinding it to powder.

name: gums
definition: The mucosal tissue that partly lies over the teeth in the mouth.

name: hail (precipitation)
definition: Precipitation in the form of balls or irregular lumps of ice.

name: hair (of body)
definition: Hair which grows on the body. This will typically be the same term for humans and non-human mammals.
burmese: တိရစ္ဆာန်သားမွေး

name: hair (of head)
definition: Hair which grows on the head of humans. In many language varieties this will be a distinct stem from that of fur.
burmese: ဦးခေါင်းဆံပင်

name: palm of hand
definition: The inner and somewhat concave part of the human hand that extends from the wrist to the bases of the fingers.

name: hand (arm)
definition: That part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in primates (including humans).

name: to hang (something)
definition: Remain suspended to some point above.

name: to be happy
definition: Having a feeling of satisfaction, enjoyment or well-being, often arising from a positive situation or set of circumstances.

name: to be hard (firm)
definition: Resistant to pressure, not easily broken, bent, or pierced.

name: head
definition: The part of the body of an animal or human which contains the brain, mouth and main sense organs.

name: forehead
definition: The part of the face between the hairline and the eyebrows.

name: to hear
definition: To perceive sound with the ear, without necessarily paying attention to it.

name: heart
definition: A muscular organ that pumps blood through the body.

name: to be heavy
definition: Of a physical object, having great weight.

name: to be high
definition: Being in a position comparatively far above to the ground.
burmese: မြင့်မားရန်

name: to hit (something)
definition: To hit against with a sharp blow or to impel, usually with a hand or weapon or to be forcefully or suddenly contacting, e.g. a tree falling down and hitting the ground.
burmese: ရိုက်နှက်ရန်

name: honey
definition: A viscous, sweet substance produced from nectar or honeydew by bees.

name: horn (of animal)
definition: A hard growth of keratin that protrudes from the top of the head of certain animals.

name: hornbill (general)
definition: A bird characterized by a long, down-curved, and frequently colored beak.

name: horse (general)
definition: A large animal with four legs of the Equus caballus species which people ride on or use for carrying things or pulling vehicles.

name: to be hot
definition: Having, giving off, or producing a high degree of heat.

name: house
definition: A building for human habitation, especially one that is lived in by a family or small group of people.

name: housefly (common)
definition: A common insect; any species of insect of the order Diptera.

name: to be hungry
definition: To be in need of food.
burmese: ဆာလောင်မှုကိုခံစားရရန်

name: to hunt
definition: To chase down prey and (usually) kill it.
burmese: အမဲလိုက်ရန်

name: to ignite (something)
definition: To start a fire or light a flame.
burmese: မီးလောင်ရန်

name: to be ill (sick)
definition: To be in poor health, suffering from a physical or mental condition that causes discomfort or pain.
burmese: နေမကောင်းဖြစ်ခြင်း။

name: insect
definition: A class of the Arthropoda typically having a segmented body with an external chitinous covering, a pair of compound eyes, a pair of antennae, three pairs of mouthparts, and two pairs of wings.

name: intestines
definition: The alimentary canal of an animal or human through which food passes after having passed all stomachs.

name: iron
definition: A malleable ductile silvery-white ferromagnetic metallic element with symbol Fe and atomic number 26, occurring principally in haematite and magnetite. It is widely used for structural and engineering purposes.

name: to be itchy
definition: Having a sensation that provokes the need to scratch.

name: jaw
definition: Either of the two opposable structures forming, or near the entrance to, the mouth.

name: joint (skeletal)
definition: The point where two bones meet, allowing movement and flexibility.
burmese: ခန္ဓာကိုယ်၏အဆစ်

name: juice (of fruit)
definition: The liquid that is produced by squeezing or crushing fruits or vegetables.

name: jungle
definition: Unmaintained wild forest or shrubland which has not im a state of cultivation. This can be part of old growth forest or the quickly speading vegetation which has taken over a fallow field.

name: to kick (stationary item)
definition: To strike something stationary with the foot.

name: to kill
definition: To put to death; to end a life.

name: knife
definition: A utensil consisting of a sharpened piece of hard material such as steel or other metal, ceramic, glass or stone, usually attached to a handle, that is formed in a manner that allows for cutting softer materials, especially meat or other food.

name: to know (something)
definition: To have knowledge or comprehension of something through learning or experience.
burmese: တစ်ခုခုကိုနားလည်ရန်

name: ladder (stairs)
definition: A series of steps or stairs that allow a person to move from one level or floor to another. This is meant primarily as the traditional log ladders, but this may differ based on differences in house construction practices.

name: lake
definition: An enclosed body of water, usually but not necessarily fresh water, from which the sea is excluded.

name: language
definition: A system of communication using the spoken or signed word or using symbols that represent words, signs or sounds.

name: to be late
definition: Occurring or arriving after the expected or usual time, or toward the end of a time period.
burmese: နေ့ဘက်နောက်ကျမည်။

name: to laugh
definition: To express pleasure, mirth or derision by peculiar movement of the muscles of the face, particularly of the mouth, causing a lighting up of the face and eyes, and usually accompanied by the emission of explosive or chuckling sounds from the chest and throat.

name: leaf (tree)
definition: The main organ of photosynthesis and transpiration in higher plants, usually consisting of a flat green blade attached to the stem directly or by a stalk.

name: aquatic leech
definition: A worm-like creature that lives in water and sucks blood from animals.

name: terrestrial leech
definition: Segmented worms that belong to the phylum Annelida and comprise the subclass Hirudinea.

name: left side
definition: The side of the body to the west when facing north.

name: ankle
definition: A joint formed where the foot and the leg meet.
burmese: ခြေချင်းဝတ်

name: foot
definition: The part of a human’s body below the ankle that is used in order to stand and walk.

name: knee
definition: The joint between the thigh and the lower leg in humans.

name: to lick
definition: To pass the tongue over something in order to taste or wet it.

name: to lie down
definition: (For a human or animal) to assume a horizontally extended position on a surface.

name: lightning (in sky)
definition: The flash of light caused by the discharge of atmospheric electrical charge.

name: to be lightweight
definition: With a small mass, little weight or density; the opposite of heavy.
burmese: ပေါ့ပါးစေရန်

name: lip (of mouth)
definition: Either of the two fleshy protrusions around the opening of the mouth.

name: to listen
definition: To perceive with the ear (paying attention to what is heard).

name: liver
definition: A large organ in the body that stores and metabolizes nutrients, destroys toxins and produces bile. Responsible for thousands of biochemical reactions.

name: to be long
definition: Having much distance from one terminating point on an object or an area to another terminating point.

name: loom
definition: A frame or machine (made of wood or other material) in which a weaver forms cloth out of thread; a machine for interweaving yarn or threads into a fabric.
burmese: ရက်ကန်းစင်

name: to lose (something)
definition: To be unable to find something; To be deprived of something which one once had.

name: to be lost
definition: Not knowing where you are and unable to find the way.

name: louse
definition: A small wingless parasitic insect of the order Phthiraptera that lives on humans, other mammals and birds.

name: to love
definition: To have an intense feeling of affection and care towards another person.

name: machete (dao)
definition: A large, heavy knife used for cutting through thick vegetation or used as a weapon. This concept should refer to the most typical cutting implement, known as the Dao or Dha in contact languages, which is widely carried, and not one of the various alternate forms used for chopping wood or other tasks.

name: man (male person)
definition: An adult human male.

name: to be many
definition: An indefinite large number of.

name: market
definition: Place of commercial activity in which articles are bought and sold.

name: mat
definition: A flat object laid on the floor to protect a person from the hard floor. Typically woven from cane, bamboo or fibers.

name: meat (flesh)
definition: The edible flesh of animals, especially that of mammals.

name: medicine
definition: A substance or preparation used for the treatment or prevention of disease, or for maintaining or restoring health.

name: milk
definition: The whitish fluid secreted by the mammary gland for the nourishment of the young; composed of carbohydrates, proteins, fats, mineral salts, vitamins, and antibodies.

name: monkey
definition: A mammal with a long tail, a small face, and usually hands and feet adapted for grasping and climbing.

name: gibbon
definition: Apes in the family Hylobatidae.

name: month
definition: A period into which a year is divided, historically based on the phases of the moon. In the Gregorian calendar there are twelve months.

name: moon
definition: A natural satellite of a planet.

name: full moon
definition: The lunar phase when the moon is fully illuminated by the sun and appears in the sky as a full circle.

name: new moon
definition: The lunar phase when the moon appears in the sky as a slender crescent shortly after its conjunction with the sun.

name: morning
definition: The period of time from the start of the day (midnight) until midday (12:00).

name: mosquito
definition: A small flying insect (of the family Culicidae) known for biting and sucking blood.

name: mother
definition: A woman who has at least one child.

name: mountain
definition: A feature of the earth's surface that rises high above the base and has generally steep slopes and a relatively small summit area.

name: mouth
definition: Opening in the lower half of a human face which is used for food ingestion and articulation.

name: muroid
definition: A large superfamily of rodents, including hamsters, gerbils, true mice and rats, and many other relatives.
burmese: ကြွက်၊အထွေထွေအသုံးအနှုန်း

name: mushroom (ground type)
definition: A type of mushroom that grows in the soil, rather than on trees.

name: mushroom (tree type)
definition: A type of mushroom that grows on or near trees, and often has a stalk and cap.
burmese: သစ်ပင်မှို

name: nail
definition: A small, thin piece of metal or other material used to fasten objects together.

name: name
definition: Any word or phrase which designates a particular person, place, class or thing.

name: to be narrow
definition: Not wide, having little width or space between two sides or edges.

name: navel
definition: A scar where the umbilical cord was attached.

name: to be near
definition: Not far distant in time or space or degree or circumstances.

name: neck
definition: The part of the body (found in some animals, including humans) that connects the head and the trunk.

name: necklace
definition: An article of jewelry that is worn around the neck.

name: needle
definition: A thin, sharp implement used in sewing, knitting and acupuncture.

name: bird nest
definition: A nest in which birds lay and hatch their eggs.

name: fishing net
definition: A piece of fabric or mesh made of threads, cords or ropes that are woven or knotted together with spaces between them, used for catching fish or other animals, or for protecting or separating things.

name: to be new
definition: Recently made, created or begun.
burmese: အသစ်ဖြစ်ရန်

name: night
definition: The period between sunset and sunrise, when a location faces far away from the sun, thus when the sky is dark.

name: noon (midday)
definition: Time of day when the sun is in its zenith.
burmese: နေ့လယ်၊ နေ့လယ်

name: nose
definition: The organ of the face used to breath and smell.

name: oil (substance)
definition: A liquid or semi-solid substance that is used for frying, sautéing, or baking food, or for greasing pans or grills.
burmese: ချက်ပြုတ်ရန်အတွက် ဆီ သို့မဟုတ် ဆီ

name: to be old (of people)
definition: To have existed or been in use for a long time, having lived or existed for a long time.
burmese: အသက်ကြီးရန်
comment: Both CONCEPTICON forms refer to people, not things.

name: otter
definition: Any of several aquatic, furbearing, weasellike mammals of the genus Lutra, having webbed feet and a long, slightly flattened tail.

name: overmorrow
definition: On the day following tomorrow.

name: owl
definition: A solitary, mainly nocturnal bird of prey, belonging to the order Strigiformes; it has large forward-facing eyes and ears and a hawk-like beak, and it can turn its head 180 degrees around.

name: parrot
definition: Any bird of the order Psittaciformes. This will typically be the Vernal Hanging-Parrot Loriculus vernalis, a mostly green species with bits of read which lives high in the canopy.
burmese: ကြက်တူရွေး

name: path (road)
definition: A thoroughfare or track that is used for traveling from one place to another, typically by foot or vehicle.
burmese: လမ်း သို့မဟုတ် လမ်း

name: to peel
definition: To remove the outer layer or skin of something.
burmese: အခွံချွတ်ရန်

name: to perch
definition: To sit or rest on a perch or elevated spot, typically of a bird or other animal.

name: person (human)
definition: A human being.

name: to pierce (puncture)
definition: To make a hole or wound in something using a sharp object.
burmese: ဖောက်ရန် သို့မဟုတ် ထိုးရန်

name: pig (general)
definition: A common, four-legged animal (Sus scrofa) that has cloven hooves, bristles and a nose adapted for digging and is farmed by humans for its meat.

name: to place (put)
definition: To set or place an object somewhere.
burmese: တစ်စုံတစ်ခုကို ထားရန်၊

name: plains (lowlands)
definition: Land that is low or close to sea level.

name: to plant
definition: To put a plant in the ground so that it strikes root and grows.

name: to play (game)
definition: To act in a manner such that one has fun; to engage in playful activities expressly for the purpose of recreation.

name: to plough
definition: To use a plough on to prepare for planting.
burmese: ထွန်ယက်ရန်

name: porcupine
definition: Rodents with a coat of sharp spines, or quills, that protect against predators.

name: cooking pot
definition: A vessel used for cooking or storing food or liquids.
burmese: ဟင်းချက်အိုး

name: to pound (of rice)
definition: To break into small pieces or powder by applying force with a tool, or to reduce something to small particles by rubbing it against a rough or hard surface.

name: to pour
definition: To cause a liquid to flow out from a container.

name: to pull
definition: To apply a force to (an object), in order that it moves towards the origin of the force that was applied.

name: to push
definition: To apply a force to (an object), in order that it moves away from the origin of the force that was applied.

name: to be raw (uncooked)
definition: Of food, being either wholly or imcompletely cooked.
burmese: အစိမ်း၊ မပြုတ်

name: to release (let go)
definition: To give freedom; to stop holding; to release from confinement or restraint.
burmese: လွှတ်ရန် သို့မဟုတ် လွှတ်ရန်

name: rib (bone)
definition: One of the long curved bones which form the rib cage.

name: cooked rice
definition: Rice that has been prepared by boiling or steaming until it is soft and edible.

name: unhusked rice (paddy)
definition: A flooded field in which rice is grown.

name: husked rice (uncooked)
definition: Rice that has not been boiled or otherwise prepared for eating.

name: rice plant
definition: An erect grass, Oryza sativa, that grows in East Asia on wet ground and has drooping flower spikes and yellow oblong edible grains that become white when polished.

name: to be ripe
definition: To be fully developed or mature, and ready to be eaten or used.

name: river
definition: A stream of water which flows in a channel from high ground to low ground and ultimately to a lake or the sea, except in a desert area where it may dwindle away to nothing.

name: to roast
definition: To expose to heat without adding fat or water until it is cooked, has a brown crust and becomes crispy.

name: roof (of building)
definition: The upper covering of a building or vehicle, typically supported by a framework.

name: root (tree)
definition: The absorbing and anchoring organ of a vascular plant; it bears neither leaves nor flowers and is usually subterranean.

name: rope
definition: Thick, strong string made of several strands that have been twisted together.

name: to be rotten
definition: Having changed its colour, smell or composition (partially or completely), due to being attacked and decomposed by microorganisms (relating to organic matter).

name: to be rough
definition: Having a texture that has much friction. Not smooth.
burmese: ကြမ်းတမ်းသည်

name: to be round
definition: Circular or having a circular cross-section in at least one direction.

name: to rub
definition: To move one's hand or an object over a surface or other object (maintaining constant contact and applying moderate pressure).

name: to rule (lead)
definition: To guide by moving in front.

name: ruler (chief)
definition: The person who has the highest authority in a group or organization.
burmese: အကြီးအကဲ သို့မဟုတ် အုပ်ချုပ်သူ
comment: CONCEPTICON has the measuring tool as the definition.

name: saliva
definition: The clear liquid that is secreted by glands in the mouth and is used to moisten food and aid in digestion.

name: salt
definition: A crystalline substance consisting of sodium and chlorine, used for seasoning or preserving food, or for a variety of other industrial and household purposes.

name: to scrape (with edge)
definition: To move an object against another object such that abrasion or minor cutting occurs.
burmese: ခြစ်ရန် သို့မဟုတ် ခြစ်ရန်

name: to scratch (with nails)
definition: To rub or scrape (a part of the body) with a sharp object (e.g. to relieve an itching).
burmese: မကြေသေးသော ဆန်၊

name: to see
definition: To perceive with the eyes, or to comprehend mentally through observation or understanding.

name: seed
definition: A mature fertilized plant ovule, consisting of an embryo and its food store surrounded by a protective seed coat (testa).

name: to sell
definition: To provide goods or services in exchange for money.

name: to sew
definition: To pass thread repeatedly through fabric or a material, using a needle, in order to join two or more parts or to make a pattern or motif.

name: shade (area)
definition: An area sheltered from direct sunlight, typically created by trees or other vegetation.

name: shadow (of something)
definition: Darkness, where light (particularly sunlight) is blocked.
burmese: မကျက်သောဆန်

name: to be shallow
definition: Having little depth, or being close to the surface of something.

name: to be sharp (of edge)
definition: Having a thin or narrow edge capable of cutting or slicing.
burmese: အစွန်းတစ်ခု၏ချွန်ထက်

name: to be sharp (of point)
definition: Having a fine point or edge that is able to cut or pierce.
burmese: ထက်မြက်သောအချက်၊

name: shield
definition: A device used to protect oneself or others from harm or danger when engaging in close combat. Typically woven from cane, carved from wood, or formed from toughened animal hide.

name: to shoot (arrow)
definition: To fire a shot from a firearm, bow or other weapon.

name: to be short (height)
definition: Small in length by comparison.

name: to be short (length)
definition: Small in length by comparison.
burmese: အတိုအရှည်ဖြစ်ရမည်။

name: to be shy
definition: To be hesitant or reserved in social situations, often due to timidity or lack of confidence. This is distinct from ashamed.

name: younger sibling
definition: Either sibling which is younger

name: silver
definition: A very ductile malleable brilliant greyish-white element with symbol Ar and atomic number 47 having the highest electrical and thermal conductivity of any metal.

name: to sing
definition: To produce musical sounds with one's voice, often in a rhythmic or melodic pattern.
burmese: သီချင်းသီဆိုရန်

name: to sink
definition: To go down in water, mud, quicksand etc. or to cause something to go down in it.
burmese: နစ်မြုပ်ရန်

name: elder sister
definition: The female sibling who is older than oneself.

name: to sit
definition: To be in a position with the upper body upright and the legs resting.

name: skin
definition: The tissue forming the outer covering of the vertebrate body: it consists of two layers, the outermost of which may be covered with hair, scales, feathers, etc. It is mainly protective and sensory in function.

name: sky
definition: The part of the earth's atmosphere and space outside it that is visible from earth's surface. During the day it is perceived as blue, and at night as black.

name: to sleep
definition: To rest in a state of decreased consciousness and reduced metabolism.

name: to be slow
definition: With low speed.
japanese: ゆっくりと, おそい

name: to be small
definition: Having a small size or dimensions, often relative to others of its kind.
burmese: သေးငယ်ဖို့

name: to smell (something)
definition: To perceive the presence of molecules in the air by inhaling them through the nose.

name: to smell bad
definition: To emit an unpleasant odor or stench.

name: to smell good (fragrant)
definition: To emit a pleasant or desirable odor or fragrance.

name: smoke
definition: An aerosol, consisting of visible particles and gases, produced by the incomplete burning of carbon-based materials, such as wood and fossil fuels.

name: to smoke
definition: To inhale smoke from for example a cigarette or a cigar.
burmese: ဆေးလိပ်သောက်ရန်

name: to be smooth
definition: Not rough; having a surface texture that lacks friction.

name: snail
definition: (Gastropoda) Ventral footed mollusk, including land snails, terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks.

name: snake
definition: Any reptile of the suborder Serpentes, typically having a scaly cylindrical limbless body, fused eyelids, and a jaw modified for swallowing large prey.

name: snot (liquid mucus)
definition: Mucus from the nose.

name: to be soft
definition: A state of consistency allowing alterations of form with ease, no big force required, to bring things into something of this state (such as e.g. soaked loam or clay soil).

name: son
definition: One's male child.

name: to be sour
definition: Having an acid, sharp or tangy taste.
burmese: အချဉ်ဖြစ်ရန်

name: to sow (crops)
definition: To scatter or disperse seeds on a field.

name: to speak
definition: To communicate by the use of words.
burmese: ပြောရန် သို့မဟုတ် ပြောရန်

name: spear
definition: a long, stabbing weapon for thrusting or throwing, consisting of a wooden shaft to which a sharp-pointed head, as of iron or steel, is attached.

name: spicy (of chilis)
definition: Provoking a burning sensation due to the presence of chillies or similar hot spices.
burmese: ငရုတ်သီးမှအစပ်

name: spider
definition: Any predatory silk-producing arachnid of the order Araneae, having four pairs of legs and a rounded unsegmented body consisting of abdomen and cephalothorax.

name: spiderweb
definition: A fine net of threads woven by a spider to catch insects.
burmese: ပင့်ကူအိမ်ကွန်ယက်

name: to spit
definition: To forcefully evacuate saliva from the mouth.

name: to squeeze
definition: To apply pressure to something from two or more sides at once.

name: to stand (in place)
definition: To assume an upright position on one's feet, often with the intention of remaining stationary for a period of time.

name: star
definition: A luminous celestial body that is made from gases (particularly hydrogen and helium) and forms the shape of a sphere.

name: to steal
definition: To take possession of property belonging to another without the consent of this owner; most typically when not observed, rather than by force.

name: to step
definition: To move the foot in walking; to advance or recede by raising and moving one of the feet to another resting place, or by moving both feet in succession.
burmese: ခြေတစ်လှမ်းယူရန်

name: stick (tree)
definition: A long, thin piece of wood, mainly left in the shape in which it grew, that does not bend.

name: to sting (of bee)
definition: To hurt, usually by introducing poison or a sharp point, or both.

name: stone
definition: A hard, naturally occurring mineral material often used for building, sculpture, or paving.

name: to be straight
definition: Not crooked or bent; having a constant direction throughout its length.

name: to be strong
definition: Capable of producing great physical force.

name: to suck
definition: To draw in a substance by creating a practical vacuum in the mouth, and as a result a difference in pressure.

name: sun
definition: The particular star at the centre of our solar system, from which the Earth gets light and heat.

name: to swallow
definition: The reflex in the human body that makes something pass from the mouth to the pharynx and into the esophagus, with the shutting of the epiglottis.

name: to sweat
definition: To excrete moisture from the skin through sweat glands, often as a result of physical exertion or high temperatures.

name: to be sweet
definition: Having the taste characteristic of sugar or honey.

name: to swell
definition: To become larger in size or volume, usually due to pressure or inflammation.
burmese: ဖောရောင်ရန်

name: tail
definition: The appendage of an animal that is attached to its posterior and near the anus.

name: to be tall
definition: Having a large distance from the base to the top, often relative to other objects or structures.
burmese: အရပ်မြင့်သည်ဖြစ်စေ၊

name: taro (kochu)
definition: A starchy root vegetable commonly used in cooking. This should be distinguished from other starchy roots used as a foodstuff.

name: tattoo
definition: A marking made by inserting ink into the layers of skin to change the pigment permanently for decorative or other reasons.

name: tea (beverage)
definition: A hot drink made by infusing dried leaves of the tea plant in boiling water. This should be the general category of drinks and not marked for the specific preparation of the tea leaves. A native or near native term is expected for all languages in the region. .

name: to be thick (of material)
definition: Relatively large distance from one surface to the opposite in its smallest solid dimension.

name: thief
definition: Someone who takes property belonging to someone else with the intention of keeping it or selling it.

name: to be thin (of material)
definition: Having a small distance from one surface to another, often relative to the object's size.

name: to be thin (people)
definition: Carrying little fat (of people).
burmese: ပိန်ဖို့၊ ပိန်တယ်။

name: to be thirsty
definition: To suffer from thirst; to have a craving to drink, which is often accompanied by the feeling of dryness in the mouth and throat.
burmese: ရေငတ်ဖို့၊

name: thorn
definition: A sharp, pointed projection on the stem or branch of a plant, developed as a form of defence from grazing animals.

name: thread (string)
definition: A long, thin and flexible form of material, generally with a round cross-section, used in sewing, weaving or in the construction of string.

name: to throw
definition: To cause (an object) to move rapidly through the air, with the force of the hand or arm.

name: thunder
definition: The large booming sound in the sky during storms, as caused by lightning heating the air around it to a very high temperature, causing it to rapidly expand and contract.

name: to tie (general)
definition: To fasten or secure something by wrapping or looping a string, rope, or other material around it and knotting it.

name: tiger
definition: Panthera tigris. A large, carnivorous feline with distinctive orange and black stripes. This concept may be understood by speakers as any large cat belonging to the genus Panthera, so care must be taken to avoid ambiguity.

name: today
definition: The present day, or the day that has recently occurred when uttered at night.

name: toe
definition: One of the extremities of the foot.

name: tomorrow
definition: The day after the present day.

name: fireplace tongs
definition: A tool consisting of two long arms with a pivot joint, used for gripping and lifting objects.

name: tongs (general)
definition: In need of some rest or sleep, due to lack of sleep or as a result of hard work or physical activity.

name: tongue
definition: The flexible muscular organ in the mouth that is used to move food around, for tasting and that is moved into various positions to modify the flow of air from the lungs in order to produce different sounds.

name: tooth (general)
definition: A hard, calcareous structure present in the mouth of many vertebrate animals (including humans), generally used for eating.

name: tree
definition: Any large woody perennial plant with a distinct trunk giving rise to branches or leaves at some distance from the ground.

name: treebark
definition: The protective outer layer of a tree trunk composed of dead cells, often used for medicinal or decorative purposes.
burmese: သစ်ပင်အခေါက်

name: branch
definition: A woody offshoot of a tree or shrub.

name: turtle (tortoise)
definition: A reptile of the order Testudines (the crown group of the superorder Chelonia), characterised by a special bony or cartilaginous shell developed from their ribs that acts as a shield.
burmese: လိပ် သို့မဟုတ် လိပ်

name: to twist
definition: To wind several things around each other (e.g. in order to form a rope or thread).

name: to be unripe
definition: Of a fruit or vegetable that has not yet fully developed.

name: urine
definition: Liquid excrement consisting of water, salts and urea, which is made in the kidneys, stored in the bladder, then released through the urethra.

name: valley
definition: Any low-lying land bordered by higher ground; especially an elongate, relatively large, gently sloping depression of the Earth's surface, commonly situated between two mountains or between ranges of hills or mountains, and often containing a stream with an outlet.

name: village
definition: A small community of houses and other buildings, typically in a rural area, often organised under unified leadership and identifiable as a community.

name: vine (creeper)
definition: Any plant with a growth habit of trailing or climbing stems or runners. Alternatively, any type of lianas.
burmese: စပျစ်၊ တွား

name: to vomit
definition: To forcefully expel the contents of one's stomach through the mouth, often as a result of illness or the ingestion of harmful substances.

name: waist
definition: The part of the body between the ribs and hips, typically the narrowest part of the torso.

name: to walk
definition: To move from one place to another by moving legs alternately, so that at least one foot is in contact with the floor or surface at any one time.
burmese: လမ်းလျှောက်ရန်

name: wall
definition: A structure built to enclose or divide an area, usually made of brick or stone, but potentially other materials as well. This should be distinct from a fence.

name: to be warm
definition: Having a temperature slightly higher than usual, still pleasant.

name: to bathe
definition: To clean oneself by immersion in water.
burmese: ရေချိုးရန်

name: to wash (general)
definition: To remove dirt and grime from an object, using water (usually with soap).
burmese: ဆေးကြောရန်

name: to wash clothes
definition: To clean pieces of clothing by using water and supplementary cleansing products as a part of hygiene routine.

name: to wash face
definition: To use water and clean one's face. This is often a distinct verb from other forms of wash.

name: water
definition: Common liquid (H₂O) which forms rain, rivers, the sea, etc., and which makes up a large part of the bodies of organisms.

name: to be weak
definition: To be lacking physical strength, or lacking strength or energy such as due to fatigue.

name: to weave (fabric)
definition: To create a fabric by interlacing threads.

name: to weep (cry)
definition: To shed tears in response to an emotional state, such as sadness, pain, or happiness.

name: west
definition: One of the four principal compass points, specifically 270°, conventionally directed to the left on maps. The direction of the setting sun.

name: to be wet
definition: To be covered or soaked with water or other liquids.

name: to ve wide (broad)
definition: Having a large distance from one side to another, often relative to the object's length or size.
burmese: ကျယ်သည်ဖြစ်စေ ကျယ်သည်

name: wind
definition: The natural movement of the air, especially in the form of a current blowing from a particular direction.

name: wing
definition: The appendage of a bird or insect used for flying or gliding, typically consisting of a thin, lightweight membrane stretched over a framework of bones or cartilage.

name: to winnow
definition: To separate the chaff from grain using wind or air.

name: winter (cold season)
definition: The coldest season of the year, between autumn and spring.
burmese: ဆောင်းရာသီ

name: to wipe
definition: To move an object or utensil over a surface or other object while maintaining contact, in order that a substance be removed from its surface.

name: woman (female human)
definition: An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.

name: wood
definition: The substance making up the central part of the trunk and branches of a tree. Used as a material for construction, to manufacture various items, etc. or as fuel.

name: worm (general)
definition: A generally tubular invertebrate of the annelid phylum.

name: year
definition: The time it takes the Earth to complete one revolution of the Sun (between 365.24 and 365.26 days depending on the point of reference).

name: yesterday
definition: The day before today.
